145.content:
Sara took you to the attic where she showed you a thick book with strange markings on the cover. "This is the reason you are just a slave to all of us, for now." she explained. "You see, we are a family of powerful witches and warlocks. You, however, were... (wince) ...adopted."

You looked at Sara, stunned. "I... I was... adopted?" you asked. you looked at her, hurt. "This family only adopted me to be a slave, an object of amusement?"

Sarah sighed. "Don't tell anyone this, okay, they'll 'kill' me!" she whispered. "You have been nothing more than a slave to this family since you were five years old but that will all change on your eighteenth birthday, one year from now as you just turned seventeen yesterday."

"How will that all change?" you asked, curious.

Sara paused, listening, then smiled. "You will have absorbed just enough magical energy, from being a slave to us, to become a warlock yourself." she told you. "If you manage that, mom will regress you to my age and you will live your life again as a valued member of the family."

"Why wasn't I told of this long ago?" you asked, frustrated.

Again, Sara sighed. "Because, stupid, the magic only builds up inside of you when you are sad, frustrated, or angry." she replied with a tone of annoyance. "I'm only telling you this because I sensed that you have enough energy to become a warlock now."

"How can I tell if I'm a warlock?" you asked.

Sara smiled. "You return to normal with your own free will." she said. "Go on, give it a try."

Having nothing to lose, you focused your concentration on being your normal height and, to your surprise and delight, you returned to your normal size almost immediately. you wanted to yell out in joy but Sarah quickly hushed you silent. "I did not return you to normal with my magic, you did that on your own." she told you. "However, the really hard part is yet to come and you are going to wish you were our slave again."

"The hard part....?" you asked, confused.

Sara giggled. "Your training, silly." she said with a smile. "All witches and warlocks must undergo five years of torturous tests and trials before they are accepted as a member of the family." she suddenly shivered. "You wouldn't know but my training began when I was five, I still have nightmares from it."

You gulped. "What should I expect?" you asked.

"It's different for everyone." replied Sarah, returning the book to its hiding place. "But I would imagine that you can expect the same treatment you had been receiving, only much worse."

"Did anyone tell you the reason for this training?" you asked.

"I did, during my training." replied Sara. "Mom told me that we witches and warlocks have a bitter enemy whose powers are just as legendary as our own but she did not tell me who."

"What... What should I do, sis?" you asked.

"The next time someone decides to shrink you, make your choice." said Sara. "Resist their power, if you wish to be trained as a warlock and become accepted as a member of the family or... allow them to shrink you if you wish things to remain as they are for the rest of your life."

"The rest of my life!?" you asked, alarmed.

Sara gave a dark chuckle. "Do you seriously think we would let you go, now that you know all about us?" she asked.

It was then that you realized that Sara did not wish to let you go and decided to give you a choice, five years of hell to become a real member of the family or a life time of servitude.

"Hobsen's choice." you muttered, leaving the attic with Sara following.

Hours later, mom returned home from work to find you in the kitchen. "Hello, dear." she said, sweetly. "Would you mind helping me, I lost something in my purse, could you be a 'doll' and go in there to look for it?"

"Do I have a choice?" you asked, wincing.

Mom grinned. "No but I thought I'd be nice about it."

With that, you felt her power seizing your body. Now was the time to decide!

What do you do?...

Mom concentrated her power onto you bu, to her surprise, you did not shrink. Sensing that you had successfully resisted her magic, you folded your arms. "I'm tired of being a slave to this family, mom." you said. "Either start treating me as a valued member of this family or cut me loose."

Mom looked at you surprised, then smiled. "Well, its about time." she muttered. "I was beginning to think you were a hopeless case, doomed to forever serve us." she gave a dark giggle. "I'd love to treat you as a valued member of this family, dear... once you earn that right."

"I've been treated like crap for twelve years, mom!" you fired back. "What did that earn me!?"

Mom smiled. "The magic needed to resist our power, of course." she replied. "Now comes your training, which will give you the magic power needed to become a warlock." she again darkly giggled. "Once you achieve that power, you will become an official member of this family."

You shuddered, remembering Sarah's warning of what that training may involve. "Where... where do I start?" you asked.

Mom shook her head, a mischievous smile forming on her face. "Since you believe we've been so unfair to you, I will allow you a choice." she said. "You can either allow me to regress you to the age of five and be trained through an intense series of tests and trials over the next five years. Once it is over, I will be proud to officially declare my darling ten year old son."

"What is the other option." you asked, almost too frightened to know.

"The other option is to continue as you are now, being our slave." replied mom, still smiling. "This will last another twelve years but there is a bright side. You will walk away from it all as a very powerful twenty nine year old warlock and a very valued member of this family as you will then be more powerful than us all."

She then crossed her arms. "So, Mark... what will it be, five years of torture to become my son or twelve years of hell to become our master?"

You had not expected this, especially not the irony of you being able to torture your entire family for the years of torment they had forced upon you. Only now you understand the reasoning behind the torment, it was to help you build enough magical power to protect yourself. Now, you had a choice... earn to become the loved son you always wished to be or earn to become their master and rule over them all.

What do you decide?

14513.content:
Can't we just get along? you think to yourself...that's what you'd like to say. But you knew better than to say that. Your mom would only take one of the two answers she presented. And that's when you realized that this...thing before you didn't give a steaming pile about you. And its most likely that she was once a slave to her family until she earned her rights...But that didn't make it right. She mistreated her own son, because her family mistreated her...And that infuriated you. There would be no Peace for your Family - it was all an endless cycle. They were all evil - PURE evil...And they no longer deserved to draw breath.

At that moment, while you stood in silence - you felt this unbelievable warm feeling well within you. You could feel the muscles in your arms and chest tighten. It was so strange that you suddenly felt so strong. And you felt angry. So incredibly angry. And the madder you got - the stronger the feeling welled up inside you. You didn't know what it was or what it meant. All you knew was one thing - that no matter what happened, you were going to stop this horrible tradition.

"No," you suddenly said. Your mother raised her eyebrow. "This is all going to stop! No training, no tests, no slaves, no masters! Its all going to end."

"You little Maggot," she said. "You think just cause you resisted one of my lower level spells that you suddenly call the shots around here? You don't! I own you! I own everyone in this family! I earned it! I have the Power!"

"And you've abused that power for long enough! I refuse to let the cycle begin again!" you shouted - you clenched your fist tightly - your knuckles made a loud cracking sound.

"Insolent little Brat," she said. "You thought we were unfair to you before? Once this is over - you won't have a single moments peace! I'll make you learn your place, just as I had to learn mine! And it will absolutely be the worst years of your life!" She suddenly raised her hand toward you - from her open palm a beam of light shot toward you. But you showed absolutely no hesitation to the beam - as it drew closer to you, the heat from within exploded into a glowing white aura, surrounding your body. It completely absorbed the blast.

Your mother was astounded...and afraid. She slowly began to back away - until suddenly, she felt her feet locked into position. She looked down and saw that the aura was around her shoes, cementing them to the floor. She looked up at you - your eyes now completely white and bolts of static shooting from them. You said nothing to her. You simply raised your open hand to her. Slowly - you began to close your fingers.

Your mother reacted painfully. She gasped for air as you heard a loud cracking sound from her chest. She placed a hand over her heard. You clenched your fist fully - your mothers eyes lit up with white aura. Her skin turned gray. Suddenly - her entire body collapsed into a pile of ashes. A small breeze picked up and the ashes began to scatter about the room.

The aura around your body died down and you took in deep breaths. You couldn't believe what had just happened. Somehow you'd killed the thing that called itself your mother...You felt surprise...but no regret. She hadn't earned the title to be called a 'mother' - especially not from you. She was cruel, and vile - she got what she deserved. But you were afraid - you had no idea how you managed to pull something like that off. And least of all, if you'd be able to do it again. You were really afraid because - what if a family member found out what you'd done and try to avenge her?

You had to work fast. You had to leave while you still stood at normal size. But...everyone in your family had magic. Where could you go that none of them could find you? If only there was a way that you could disguise yourself from their magic. If only there was an...instruction manual for using magic. That's when an idea came to you; your mom had to have had a spell-book. How else would she keep track of all her spells or plan to train you? But where would she have kept it?

Suddenly you saw the light bounce off a shiny surface. You looked down into the pile of ashes and saw a golden key with a gold chain. She must've worn it around her neck. Suddenly you remembered something - your mom liked keeping you around her feet when she shrank you. She'd leave you in her shoes closet for days on end...but one day when you looked up - you saw something. Hidden behind one of the coats was a keyhole on the wall. It was a stretch, but you had to at least try!

You grabbed the key and began to work your way upstairs. You were a bit cautious - your two siblings may be younger than you, but they still had powers stronger than yours, and they least of all knew how to use theirs. So you quietly proceeded over to her room. When inside - you locked the door. You slipped over to her closet and opened it up. You quickly covered your nose - even at normal size, her shoes were so pungent. Using your free hand, you moved a few coats aside. And there it was - the lock and keyhole. You inserted the key and turned it to the right - hearing a loud click. Suddenly the wall parted in two from the seam. Inside was a tiny room with a podium at the far end. And on the podium was a large book.

"Okay - half way there," you say to yourself. You turned and closed the closet in case the locked door wasn't enough. You moved toward the book. But then you began to think - just cause you could do magic didn't mean you'd be able to perform a written spell. You just wished he had some answers on what his powers were and how to control them.

Suddenly, the cover of the book swung open and the pages began turning themselves - as if a breeze had picked up. Cautious - you slowly approached the book. It didn't look like a spell - but more like something you'd find in a text book about Magical History. You began reading the Text out-loud.

"For Centuries - Magic has been passed down the line from parent to child. It is most common that Magic Wielding Children exhibit use of Magic at very young Ages. Those children who do not, are traditionally used as little more than Household slaves to serve their Magic Using Relatives. Sometimes an unimpressive slave child - with time - will build up enough willpower and immunity to resist the Magic Spells of some Family Members. At that time, freeing the child from bondage and training must commence immediately. Should the child never exhibit any magical ability - they are usually deemed a lost cause, and shall remain a slave for as long as (natural or otherwise) their master deems fit."

You noticed how there was no mention that after enduring 29 years of Slavery - a Magic Wielding Slave could emerge a Powerful Warlock, Master of his entire Family. You felt angered - that shit about 12 more years of Hell was all a lie. Your mom just didn't want to loose her slave-toy! As your anger grew, you felt that she deserved what she got...And that's when you suddenly noticed the next paragraph.

"However - in rare cases - every few generations or so, an Anomaly will occur; a child with no signs of ability will be born into slavery - unbeknownst to it or the parents that the child's magical talent lays dormant within them. The Anomaly's powers continue to grow, welling within - reaching to nearly dangerous levels of ability. Most often in these cases, the Anomaly's abilities will not awaken until a resistance to Magic has formed."

Next to the definition is a picture of a being with a white aura surrounding him. This suddenly made sense on how you were able to kill your mom. Not only were you born into bondage, you were also a genetic oddity. But this was a bit of a good thing. You felt that you were born unlucky to not be treated right by your mom - but all this time, you had a little bit of luck, growing within you. You looked at the book - it opened to the right page. It was like it could read what you needed and showed it to you. Knowing that it had answers - you were positive that it could have what you needed.

But you couldn't be distracted anymore - you had to find a protection spell to avoid detection. You began to comb through the book and finally found the spell section. You searched through it, but before you got to the Cloaking spells, you found something else.

"Magicus Orption - A forbidden, dangerous level spell. When used in company of other magic wielding beings, this spell will allow you to steal their magical powers. Their magic ability and knowledge is added to your overall collective. Was responsible for some of the most dangerous Warlocks in history. Can only be used on Living Wizards and Witches."

That got you thinking. You couldn't take your mother's power - she was already dead. But your siblings were still alive. Instead of having to hide from your brother and sister...maybe you could take their power. Then you could kill them easily. But you thought - did you really want to kill a 14 and 10 year old? But then...they'd always been cruel to you. Plus - there was a chance that Sarah had once been older - and went through Training to get where she is. There was no doubt in your mind that both of them were just as evil as your bitch of a mother. And one day they'd probably do the same with their children.

So what will you do?
14513.title: This Ends NOW!

145131.content:
(Before my last post is deleted for inconsistency - I didn't read the chapter "Don't tell Anyone" before writing the previous chapter and apologize for the inconsistency. But there's not much that can be done about it now, so I'll just keep going.)

All you could think about was your anger and rage at your Mom for all she did to you. And your siblings just went along with it as well. It felt like an even bigger betrayal that they would do it, cause Sarah told you that you all were adopted. Your family wasn't worth being a part of - and unfortunately for your now deceased mother - the helpless little boy she adopted from the slave-trade - turned out to be a Super Powered Anomaly.

You Promised yourself that you were going to end this - No. Matter. What.

You slowly exited the room and walked down the hall to Dan's room. All that ran through your mind was all the degradation he'd put you through. He loved making you smaller than him so he could wrestle with you and always win. He'd kick you around a few times. But you couldn't stand to remember what he did to you once he reached puberty. Sick and Evil - the words flowed through your mind.

You entered his room - you spotted him typing a message to a friend on his laptop. He turned toward you and said, "Hey Shrimp-Boat." That was his usual nickname for when he shrunk you down. "Is dinner ready yet?"

"No," you said, calmly.

"Okay - hey, could you get me a soda?" he asked.

"You're not getting a Soda Today," you said - your tone becoming significantly darker. You closed the door behind you. He finally turned to you with a bit of a surprised and irritated look.

"I don't really care for your attitude, Shrimp-Boat," he said. "If you're not careful - we'll just have to do some wrestling."

Listen to him - trying to treat you as more of a brow-beaten slave rather than a brother. You decided to no longer indulge him.

"Still here, huh?" he asked when he saw you weren't moving. "Alright - down ya go!"

"Magicus Orption!" you suddenly shouted. Your brother suddenly glowed with green energy. It shot from his body and went into yours. You felt so exhilarated. Your brother on the other hand, looked like he'd had the wind knocked out of him. He fell to his knees gasping for breath. He looked at you again and held out his hand - attempting to shrink you...He was astonished that it failed. And frankly so were you.

"What?! What did you do to me?" he asked.

"I took away your 'Toys'," you said, cleverly. "I also took your knowledge of spell-use as well." You searched through a few of the spells he knew. "Oh...you little jerk - You used magic to make yourself 'longer'? That's kind of sad."

"M-Mom!" Dan shouted trying to call for help.

"Mommy isn't here anymore, Little Boy," you say. "You'll be seeing her in Hell, very soon."

Dan threw up his hands in defense, "Wait- Wait! ...Bro...c'mon. You're not really gonna kill you're own brother."

"One - Sarah told me that I was adopted; I have no relation to you," you say darkly. "Two - all of my life, the only thing that you've done is make me miserable! You shrunk me and bullied me, and stood by and laughed as Sarah and mom did it as well; I have no emotional bond with you either!"

"Dude - I...I'm sorry. i was just...doing what Mom told me to do."

"That's a crock - you did it cause it was Fun...And if I let you go now - you'll grow up and do exactly the same thing to a little helpless, defenseless orphan who only ever wanted to be part of a family. Who gives a Damn about your apologies?!" In your anger, you threw up your hand and your aura erupted from around you. You heard the sound of his rib-cage compressing. Like your mom, his skin turned gray and he fell apart, leaving a pile of ash behind.

"Two down...one to go," he said. You felt so great about what you'd just done. Your power nearly doubled after taking him down - and now you had the knowledge to perform other spells. With Sarah's power, you'd feel incredible. But you thought about sparing Sarah - she had after all taught you about how you could resist your mom's magic...But then you remembered this morning, while you were trying to get breakfast. "This Ends, today," you told yourself.

You left the room and found Sarah, descending the staircase to look for everyone. She saw you leave Dan's room.

"Hey," she said with a smirk. "Judging how you're not 5 years old - I take it you got duped into the 12 years of slavery thing."

"Oh - I wouldn't say that," you said darkly. You raised your hand. "Magicus Orption!"

Sarah glowed with a blue aura before her magic was absorbed into your body. However - there was a different reaction this time. When Sarah's magic left - she was no longer a 10 year old girl - she looked to be about five years OLDER than you - about 22. Perhaps when all magic left her - whatever spells were cast on her were cancelled out. She did mention that she went through what you did and finished her training - this must be what she really looked like.

"How did you do that?" she asked you.

"I took your magic - it seems that it also dispelled anything cast on you as well."

"...Well, it is good to not be 10 years old anymore - why'd you take my magic?"

"You've abused your power for long enough - the cycle ends here!" you say to her.

"I see...so you're gonna kill me? You're gonna take your Revenge on me - the one who told you that you could resist and become a member of this family?"

"I'm not gonna kill you for that - I'm going to kill you for everything else you've done. Like her and Dan - you used me for your own amusement."

"I HAD to! I lived exactly what you lived through and FIVE years MORE! Quite frankly if it meant not only freedom but equality, I'd have done anything. And don't try to lie that you wouldn't either!"

"I WOULDN'T!" you yelled. "Unlike you - I'd remember all the things that happened to me! I wouldn't put another person through that. So don't you lie to me, like you had no choice...Remember what you told me this morning? What was it that you told me? Oh yeah...you said it was Funny." You suddenly raised your hand - she tensed up like your mom and brother did. Her ribs were cracking. "Is it Funny, now?!"

Without another word to say - your sister disintegrated into dust...and for the first time, you felt regret. She did after all show you the light at the end of the tunnel. She wasn't as bad as Dan or Mom - even when she'd purposefully smother your face with her feet...But she was an innocent like you. Adopted into slavery and mistreated...just like you. She just...wasn't as unbreakable as you.
You shed a tear for what you'd done.

--

You'd worked a little fast - as inexplicable as it was, you'd just murdered three people. People would notice, so you had to get going. So you packed a suit-case of as many clothes as you had. You also took Dan's laptop - it could come in handy. You packed up all the food in the fridge. You didn't know where you were gonna go, but you had to get lost while the going was good. That's when you had an idea - you soon climbed the stairs to the Spell Book. (It can be in the Attic or his Mom's closet - up to you.)

"You're coming with me," you told the book - sensing its inexplicable 'sentience'. You took it from the podium and began to comb through it again. You found a spell of mind - manipulation. The spells work if the victim hears the incantation - so it seemed plausible that you could cast one over the phone...and that's what you did. You called your Mom's bank. Using the spell - you managed to transfer your mom's savings into a private account you had made, with no questions asked.

Good - you had food, clothing, and a means of drawing funds - at least until you got a job. And an inexhaustible supply of magic wouldn't hurt. While browsing the book, you also found a Pyro-Spell. So you went around the house - collecting every bit of valuables that you could carry - from loose change, to allowances, to jewelry. Soon you were all packed up - for safe-keeping, you put the spell book into a leather back-pack and strapped it to your back. You took a long trench coat, a hat, and an umbrella, just in case.

You took one last look around this den of slavery and degradation. You took up your suitcase and left - casting the Pyro-Spell on your way out. The flames started in the center of the house and spread all around. You were promptly down the street before the house completely went up in flames. Your old life of slavery was going up in flames. Your new life with unlimited opportunity lay before you.

"I'd like to speak to the Reader, if you don't mind...Where we go from here is a choice I leave to you. You can end the story here and now...or you can follow me on another, far grander adventure."

"IM going to meet Tommy at the Park to shoot some hoops and your coming with me. You should be fine in there for the next few hours." and with that he begins to slide his wiggling socked toes into the sneaker. There is no escape for you as his heal eventually thumps in and he ties them up nice and tight.

You are bounced and jostled around inside hitting inot the interior and his foot. No real damage is sustained except to your pride.

He gets on his bike and rides to the park where Tommy is already waiting with the basketball. Dan makes you remain in the sneaker for the whole game. The smell getting worse and worse with each minute, not to mention the sweat buildup. The play for over an hour.

After taking a brake, they sit on the park bench and have a drink to cool down.

Its then that Dan.......
1531.title: Into one of his shoes

choices: Dan wants to show you to Uncle Jeff
Dan wants to pull another prank with you on him
15313.content:
Dan heads out on his skate board, slamming you down with every push off of his skate board. His sweaty foot pounds you down soaking you in sweat again. Dan finally reaches home and heads up to his room. He takes his shoe off and peels your from your prison and into his palm.
"Haha hey Mark guess what? Uncle Jeff is here, remember last time when I shrunk you and put you in his boxers?!" he says. you shuddered at the memory. Uncle Jeff was a tall ripped man who served in the military. When he found you stuck between his butt cheeks he made you stay in there as punishment all night.
What does Dan have in store for you?
15313.title: Heads home and wants to show you to his Uncle J...

choices: Mess with Ron's gigantic feet, that should annoy him.
Mess around with his legs or climb to his face.
Get to the televisiion remote and keep messing with the channels.
154.content:
"Mark! Where're you going?" You hear an all too familiar voice say from behind you.

"Damn!" You mumble under your breath.

You turn around to see your little sister Sara arriving along with her best friend, Carly. This probably meant trouble. Although, your condition is supposed to be a secret and not to be abused according to your mom, Sara went ahead and told Carly and not wanting your life to be even worst than it already is, you decided to let Sara get away with it as long as Carly is the only one. But it still sucks because they always want you to do something ridiculous.

Sigh, whatever. Just do this one last thing or so and soon you get to Alen's house and the curse will be broken with you finally having a normal life.

"She asked you a question!" Carly yelled.

You raised an eyebrow, wanting to put the girl almost half your age (eight) in her place but then you would end up being less than half her size for a humiliating defeat. So you go along with it.

"Just going to a friend's house. What do you two want?"

"You can go to your friend's house later", Sara says.

"We have an important mission for you to do", Carly continues.

"A mission, huh? Like cleaning under your dresser again? Forget it."

"No. Nothing like that!"

"Then what?"

"We need you to make my big brother get out of the living room so we can use the TV!" Carly says.

"Yeah, if no one stops him, he will stay in there all day watching TV or playing video games!" Sara adds in.

You take a second to think and then remember who Carly's brother is. Ron. An eighteen year old who will be starting college after the summer. He is taller and stronger than you are and you do not know him well enough to barge in his house and tell him to stop doing something you wish you could be doing.

"He wouldn't listen to me. Just wait or use the one of the TVs at our house." You reply.

"But Mark! We need Carly's TV! It's bigger! And you aren't going to tell him to get off, you're going to make him!"

"Make him?" You start to blurt out laughing, "I don't think I have much leverage against, Ron."

"What is leverage?" Carly asks. Which prompts you to roll your eyes.

"Guys, I'm sorry I can't help."

"Mark, listen! We want you to annoy him and that will make him eventually go to a different room with a smaller TV!" says Sara.

"How?"

"I'm going to shrink you. And then you'll just be like an annoying bug until he finally gets out! Once he leaves, we'll make you big again!"

"Are you kidding me!? This is nuts! He'll just flick me away or crush me if I annoy him!"

Suddenly, instead of looking down at the two girls, you are starting to reach their size and then much smaller, looking up at them as they continue to grow. Soon your face is no longer even level with the sole of Carly's flip flops.

"Unbelievable." You sigh.

"Get on!" Carly exclaims as she bends down and puts her hand out.

You have no choice but to comply at this point. Even if you did run away and hide in the nearby grass, it would take all day to get home at this size if you somehow survived the giant wildlife and then you would have to get help without getting squashed. You walk onto the girl's long fingers and onto her palm, crouching to maintain balance as the girls walk you to her house.

As they walk to the front door of Carly's house, Sara whispers, "Remember, the faster you do this, the faster you are big again to get to your friend's house!"

You perk up a little realizing that this is the only obstacle stopping you from lifting this stupid curse. Do this last stupid assignment and you can live a normal life with you having the second most power in the household.

The girl's walk into the living room and on the couch lays a tall, muscular young man. Wearing a tank top and gym shorts with his body elongated on the couch as he watches the sports channel. Carly walks to the couch and tilts her hand, making you fall onto the sofa.

Both the girls start giggling, prompting Ron to look at them.

"Go away." He said.

"I wish I could shrink my brother, then we wouldn't have this problem." Carly whispered to her friend before they both strolled out the living room.

Ron paid no attention to what she said and kept watching, not realizing he had a tiny occupant on the couch with him. You are left staring at his towering bare feet that you are sharing the sofa with.

"What the hell did I get into..." You mutter, wondering where you can even start.
154.title: Mission

1542.content:
You start walking forward, your legs quivering and body trembling in fear, and your feet sinking into the soft couch cushion. So many things can go wrong and you can end up crushed to a tiny pulp. When you finally break the curse, there will be hell to pay. Until then, you need to make this big jackass move off the damn couch.

Soon, you find yourself right next to the dry, cracked heal of the god-like giant. You cannot help but notice the scent of soap in the air. The guy is actually clean, there is at least that. You look up at the feet which are several hundred feet tall. Just looking at them makes you shudder as you can only imagine how many lives have been ended under the wrinkly soles. The giant twitches his foot or wiggles his toes every so often while watching the TV.

After some thought, you decide not to annoy Ron by messing with his feet, just one minor movement from his heel would easily make you into paste. You decide to head past his ankles and you are now at the base of his long hair legs. Reaching up, you grab one of the hairs, as thick as a rope and start climbing up. You make sure that you climb very slowly, leaving plenty of space in time between each climb as to not alert Ron to a tingling feeling, prompting an itch.

A few minutes pass, and you are now on top of his leg. You walk through a thicket of bamboo-like hair, your shirt brushing against a few. The ground suddenly shakes and you look up to see a gigantic hand approaching! Long fingers descend onto the leg a few dozen feet ahead and long nails dig into the titan's skin and then push forward, creating a sickly scraping noise as you realize you have caused an itch and he is about to relieve it by scratching towards your direction! Knowing there is nothing you can do, you simply coward behind a hair strand as the fingernails approach but a shadow casts around you as you are luckily in between two fingers as he scratches ahead and then lifts his hand back up to rest on his stomach again. You look up to see heaps of dead skin, uprooted hairs and bent strands slowly rising up. All this without the giant even moving his eyes from the TV.

Walking slower than ever to avoid the dangerous situation, you soon make it past the giant's knee, up his thigh and at the beginning of his gym shorts.

You can climb over the shorts, continuing to his face where maybe you can scare him or keep yelling in his ear. Then another idea pops up, although you are not too enthusiastic on it but you think it can work. You can climb under his shorts and make it to his sensitive area, arouse him without noticing and soon he will not be in the mood to watch television or he will at least leave for a while to relieve himself...
1542.title: Why You Do This
